attributes.action: Stop the government taking our country back into Brussels by stealth
attributes.additional_details: the government are ignoring the referendum, we voted clearly to stay a sovereign nation, Kier Starmer does not have the right or mandate to ignore the referendum result.
attributes.background:
I would like the government to stop ignoring the referendum to withdraw from Brussels, we had a referendum to remain a sovereign nation.
This needs to be upheld, the government needs to stop taking us back by stealth, this is unacceptable on every level. The people of Great Britain have spoken.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government have not announced any plans to re-join the EU.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
